name: imaexi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))

comment: The image of a set is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
